raw_body:
FERNANDO – DAKSHINI (SHINI) MIRANEE (nee SAMARAWEERA). Called Home to Jesus,​ dearly loved wife of the late Hilary D Fernando,​ daughter of the late Selwyn and Muriel Samaraweera,​ sister of the late Sirancee & late Dr Noel Gunawardana and of Rukmini & the late Neville Mendis,​ loved and cared for by cousins & many nephews & nieces. Remains lie at her residence 49/​5,​ Fife Road,​ Colombo 05. Cortege leaves residence at 4.30 p.m. on Friday,​ 29th March for a Christian Burial at the Family Grave in the General Cemetery Kanatte at 5.00 p.m. Donations to Sri Lanka Cancer Homes,​ Maharagama will be gratefully accepted instead of Floral Tributes – Thank you.
021899
